title: 5.11 Shyvana
body: Anyone have any feedback about Shyvana since her little W buff? I'm looking for an excuse to brush the dust off and bring her out in ranked again. Was this buff enough to be worth it? I haven't had the chance to play her.

replies.body: Eh, it was barely a buff. It reduced the damage on your w if you aren't autoing in the laning phase its slightly weaker but if you combo it with her e while autoing you obliterate people. Especially early it does a lot of damage.
It's definitely noticeable for me, especially with my clear times, it unfortunately doesn't fix her problem of being kited into the high heavens unfortunately.
